attributes.action: Create a Skate Park in Banbridge District.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are to many children in Banbridge District drinking in solitude park in banbridge but yet the council wants to refurb it, the council is cleaning up parks around the district for tax payers money to be wasted on anti-social teenagers to go out and destroy the newly refurbised parks. So, I want a out door,free skate bowl so that it can not be destroyed these bowls are made of concreate which means people could g oto these skate parks to have fun an not have to drive 20-30 miles to get a skate park or shop. If there also was a skate park in the Banbridge District it would atract busnesses to the area.
